name: places/ChIJCahgnBNawokRH7SJgnV7HA0
formattedAddress: 228 Park Ave Suite 97716, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 228 Park Ave Suite 97716, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: If I could give 0 stars, I would. Their customer service reps do not have the answers. They read articles and then come back with answers not relevant to your questions, and just regurgitate responses. They have yet to be able to answer me as to why a cleared deposit from Jan.5 is not available to be withdrawn on January 31. They are withholding my money and have come up with no explanation other that "since you traded a stock and it takes 2 days to clear, your whole brokerage account is on hold, not just the sale price of the stock you sold". That means a $1600 trade I made is holding up over $20,000 that can't be transferred to my bank. They are coming up with every excuse why it keeps saying $0 available to withdraw, even though my funds were deposited 26 days ago. I am now scared to death because they won't release my money. Every message I have sent, it takes hours to get anyone to respond, and then they don't have the right answer. They even told me I should be able to withdraw from my High Yield Savings acct. to my bank account when it CLEARLY states on their policies that you can ONLY transfer from the brokerage account to your bank account.... so the customer service person doesn't even know how the platform works. I am very fearful this company is trying to keep my money, and there is A LOT in there.

originalText.text: I don’t know how this almost has 5 stars in the App Store. Definitely not user friendly. I signed up yesterday depositing $20. I go in today after receiving the welcome email to find out I will get charged $5 monthly for paper statements, unless I change my email, because the email I have is invalid(?) and I have to use another one because mine is already in use(by me unless I just got scammed out of my account)! Tried to go to the help center and the app crashes! So ya don’t believe these reviews they probably bought them from China! In my opinion!

originalText.text: I don't think anyone works there.  Response times are HOURS for any sort of help request (so far - I may revise my review and say that response times are DAYS, but we'll see).  Invest your money elsewhere.

text.text: I don't think anyone works there.  Response times are HOURS for any sort of help request (so far - I may revise my review and say that response times are DAYS, but we'll see).  Invest your money elsewhere.

originalText.text: I've been trying for two weeks to withdraw fund, unsuccessfully. I'm being told I need to link a bank account, I've had a bank account linked for more than a year and have never had any issues depositing money, I've tried linking two other bank accounts, I've still been unable to withdraw funds. I'm shocked the SEC has no regulation's on needing a live person to talk to to resolve these type of issues. my advice to anyone wanting to use this service to Check with BBB before depositing any funds, at this point I've turned to the SEC for assistances to recover my funds

originalText.text:
I opened an account with them because I believed they were offering the option to buy treasury bills, apparently, they were not. It took almost a week for my funds to settle. After that time i went to move my funds out and into robbinhood. They blocked my transfer and are now making me jump through hoops to get my money back.  Their CS in live chat took about a day to reply to my msg, and it was a copy and paste reply. It’s been about 2 weeks and they are still holding my money hostage. Mind you this is isn’t a small amount 30k+, and they still won’t give me the curtesy of an actual human reply, so I can’t imagine they would do the same for anyone moving less.
If you are not 100% sure about using Public. DO NOT USE THEM, I’m guessing for you to be treated like an actual customer you would need to invest upwards of a million dollars and I still have my doubts about that.
You can have CS this bad when you are holding others people’s money.
